special_meat_bits.description: Tender chicken tenders stuffed with jalape√±os and cream cheese, coated in a crispy spicy crust.
Mouthwatering beef brisket bites oozing with melted cheddar cheese, encased in a golden, crunchy shell.
Delicate lamb lollipops marinated in a fiery blend of spices, finished with a zesty chili glaze.
Succulent pork belly cubes, generously topped with a blend of spicy nacho cheese and crunchy tortilla chips.
A savory eruption of mixed beef and pork sliders, each one overflowing with molten pepper jack cheese and a fiery salsa.
